text: Monster Math Squad is an animated educational children's television series. The series produced by DHX Media and aired on Kids' CBC on November 12, 2012 to September 14, 2013. ==Plot== The series follows the trio of monsters―Max, Lily, and Goo―to solve in math problems. Category:Animated television series Category:2012 Canadian television series debuts Category:2013 Canadian television series endings Category:Canadian children's television series Category:Children's television series
title: Monster Math Squad
